body_html: I have run into similar issues as well while training ImageNet. It will hang at the 1st iteration of evaluation consistently on certain servers with certain architecture (and not on other servers with the same architecture or the same server with different architecture), but always the 1st iter during eval on validation. When I was using Torch, we found nccl can cause deadlock like this, is there way to turn it off?
